goal.ch: 學習機械加工，程式設計、電子學、自動控制、訊號偵測、數據分析等基本實驗技術，並能將所學的實驗技巧結合，完成自主研究的實驗專題。
goal.en: Learning machining, programming, electronics, automatic control, signal detection, data analysis, and other basic experimental techniques, and being able to integrate the acquired experimental skills to complete independent research projects.
